DIV1.HEAD: A short and true Accompt of the Present State of the East-India Companies Stock, as it now lies before the Honourable House of Commons.

ROW.CELL: Ballance of Quick Stock in England and India
Dead Stock valued at (tho' it cost the Com∣pany much more)

DIV1.P: The Original Stock paid in was but 369891 l. 5 s. out of which the Dead Stock was raised, and the Trade till now car∣ried on with great Credit to the Nation. By which it may appear that there is sufficient Stock left still to continue it.
